hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.
